name: Despacito
description:
That evening

the glorious sunset

the pink trunks

the old man named Gemingbek(革命别克)

all details vivid

but the truth of that evening is forever lost

A red velvet

a saxophone

with infinite sadness

how do they constitute time?

In the end you can fly

but it’s hard to go back to the past

Take your time

Despacito…

 

A game inspired by Li Juan(李娟)

Press "W/A/S/D" keys (or arrow keys) to move

Press "E" key to interact
